name: Remembrance (Specie)
description:
You are a girl named Nailyn, daughter of a goddess who lost her memories after being attacked, connects the crest to retrieve her memories and thus return home.

Controls: 

In keyboard:

WASD = move

J = dash

In Joystick:

Left Analog = Move

B(in XBOX) or Circle(in Playstation) = Dash
